PREAMBLE: This week head to the legacy '2016' version of Charlotte Motor Speedway's "Road" layout. A combination of the twisty infield with a challenging uphill corner, and 3/4 of the full oval makes for great racing. The strong draft around the oval section will lead to a lot of last-lap strategy - do you wait behind the leader to pass on the oval, or try to lead out the whole last lap?
